p: To date, H2N9 has been absent in Korea but avian LPAI H7N9 has been recently detected in migratory birds [ 15, 16]. Furthermore, the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO) assessed that the likelihood of H7N9 transmission is low with high uncertainty for the Russian Federation, Mongolia, Japan, and the Republic of Korea through movements of migratory or nomadic wild birds [ 17].
